about_the_game:
An indie 3d action adventure game. You can play as sam run, slash, and transform into animals, and explore the large world. Travel the world and get the ability to transform into animals. Try to find your way back home.

Inspired by the Legend of Zelda games, Ocarina of Time , Wind Waker, and Breath of the Wild.

Features:
Transform into animals
A Beautiful original soundtrack
